name: aks-hands-on
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y jq make curl apt-transport-https ca-certificates gnupg && curl -fsSL https://pkgs.k8s.io/core:/stable:/v1.30/deb/Release.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/kubernetes-apt-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb https://pkgs.k8s.io/core:/stable:/v1.30/deb/ /' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/kubernetes.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y kubectl && kubectl version --client --output=yaml || true && NAME=$(git config user.name || true); if [ -z "$NAME" ]; then NAME=anon-$(openssl rand -hex 2); fi; NAME=$(echo "$NAME" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr -cs 'a-z0-9' '-'); echo 'export AWS_REGION=ap-northeast-1' >> ~/.bashrc && echo "export TF_VAR_name_prefix=eks-hands-on-${NAME}" >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'echo Using name_prefix=$TF_VAR_name_prefix' >> ~/.bashrc
